snippet: The prince said his fortune would go to his charity for causes including disease eradication, women’s empowerment and disaster relief.
abstract: Prince Alwaleed bin Talal of Saudi Arabia vows to donate his entire $32 billion fortune to his charity Alwaleed Philanthropies for causes including disease eradication, women's empowerment and disaster relief.
lead_paragraph: The prince said his fortune would go to his charity for causes including disease eradication, women’s empowerment and disaster relief.

headline.main: Saudi Prince Alwaleed Bin Talal Vows to Donate $32 Billion to Charity
headline.print_headline: World Briefing | Middle East; Saudi Arabia: Prince to Donate Billions
